name: DeFaster
description:
You have to play a cannon right in the middle of the battle, dangerous projectiles will be launched in you, which will cause damage when touched. You need to move the shield so as to reflect as many shells as possible, and this will all happen under a pleasant soundtrack. You will not get bored, because the frequency of sending shells is growing.

Features
  • Endless gameplay
  • Pleasant appearance
  • Pleasant soundtrack
